entities.name: ministry
entities.description: The Ministry is mentioned as an entity that wouldn't want everyone to know a dirty great serpent. ("the Ministry wouldn’t want everyo ne to know a dirty great serpent")

entities.name: arthur
entities.description: Arthur Weasley is mentioned as the father of George and Fred. ("So where were you when it happened, Dad?" "That’s my business," said Mr. Weasley)

entities.name: george
entities.description: George Weasley is mentioned as asking his father about what he was doing. ("So where were you when it happened, Dad?")

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred Weasley is mentioned as interrupting his father and asking a question. ("When you say you were ‘on duty ,’ “what were you doing?”")

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is mentioned as warning Arthur about discussing something in public. ("Arthur!” said Mrs. Weasley warningly.")

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is mentioned as being on duty and reading the Daily Prophet. ("I was just reading about Willy Widders hins’s arrest when you arrived.")

entities.name: willy widdershins
entities.description: Willy Widdershins is mentioned as being arrested and having a jinx backfire. ("You know Willy turned out to be behind those regurgitating toilets last summer?")

entities.name: daily prophet
entities.description: The Daily Prophet is mentioned as the newspaper that Mr. Weasley was reading. ("H e  s n a t c h e d  u p  t h e  Daily Prophet,")

relationships.description: Mr. Weasley was reading about Willy Widdershins’s arrest in the Daily Prophet. ("I was just reading about Willy Widders hins’s arrest when you arrived.")
Willy Widdershins turned out to be behind the regurgitating toilets last summer. ("You know Willy turned out to be behind those regurgitating toilets last summer?")
